videopoker

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • videopoker.Statistics
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Statistics107DB

    public abstract class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class that always the user to define its own statistics

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistics

        public Statistics(java.lang.String[] hands)
        Constructs an object of type Statistics. Creates an Hash Map according to the given statistic types given by the parameter hands. Additionally it creates two entries in the Hash Map with names "Other" and "Total"

    • Method Detail

      • putStatistic

        public void putStatistic(java.lang.String type)
        This method increments by one the value of the entry in the Hash Map given by the parameter type
        Parameters:
        type - type of statistics we wish to increment

      • addStatistics

        public abstract void addStatistics(java.lang.String type)
        This method makes it possible for the user to manipulate how to add a hand type result to the statistics
        Parameters:
        type - type of hand
